{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PESI |model=WA224P |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/10/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PQP-WA224P |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM8628 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF016-70-4C-EI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ADMtek |wi1_chip1_model=ADM8628 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2958 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=private |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://web.archive.org/web/20060115181305/http://www.pesi.com.tw/Backend/Product/productDriver/WA224P_manual_V12_enu.pdf Manual (via archive.org)] :The device does not seem to have a web configuration interface.
"41713-80215-03" is on the board in the FCC photos.
The manuals (FCC and non) show the sample SSID as '''WA254'''.
Likely 00:06:F4 ('''PESI''') OUI...
